name: Tale on night
description:
Each time you are leaving the baby alone with the tablet you do not know what he can see there and then be afraid to cry at night. We have tried to make in our fairy tales are only good stories with happy endings. We have selected from the world heritage tales only the everlasting histories. But most importantly, our artist painted it so kindly, so even negative characters only call a kind smile. Now the child can flip through page after page, and will only see the calm and good dreams.
Besides tales can announce himself, allowing everyone to become an actor or a director, giving the whole a cheerful conversation. And thanks to iCloud, a daddy delayed at work could dictate favorite fairy tale and his cute child sleeps under the father's voice. But, of cause, we would like that our stories are read and listened to the whole family. But the main thing they need to look - thanks to amazing new definition Retina screen iPad and iPhone miraculous image appears in all its glory.
The program is delivered in English and Russian languages. What also makes it possible to learn English and Russian languages.
